body_html:
same problem, i only have libcudnn.so.7. I edit binary file python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/libtensorflow_framework.so , change libcudnn.so.6
to libcudnn.so.7 . surprised, it work.

System information

  • Linux OpenSUSE 42.3
  • Tensorflow version 1.5.0-dev20171103
  • cuDNN v6
